input.sentences: we saw some interesting statues on our trip .
a lot of it was pretty plain | though .
we got to ride some of the ferris wheels .
just walking around parks was pretty relaxing .
output.sentences: Friends wanted to take a trip to see different types of statues.
They walked along some pretty water next to a plain lot that was busy with people.
They came across a large ferris wheels where there could here people squealing in laughter on the ride.
It was relaxing to be walking along the pretty scenery along the way.
It had been an overall tranquil day along the water.
